name: DUXBURY DUCK
notes:
Alden design #250.
Originally called DUXBURY DUCK KNOCKABOUT.
Designed for the shoal ridden waters of Duxbury Bay Mass. (USA). It is thought that few of the original boats still exist. New Boats are reportedly being built by: Snug Harbor Boatworks (USA)
(By 2013 one was completely restored atJones River Landing in Kingston, MA)
